Our esteemed senior healthcare organization is looking for a Vice President to lead our expanding PACE program. Review the qualifications below, and if they match your experience, click APPLY today!

PACE Vice President Responsibilities

  • Work closely with executive leadership to continue current growth trajectory
  • Lead PACE Program operations for existing centers and oversee the launch of new sites
  • Collaborate with and support the President of the PACE program in advancing initiatives and ensuring program compliance
  • Ensure effective staffing for the smooth operation of each center.

PACE Vice President Requirements

  • 5-7 years of VP Level or Regional Leadership and/or Business Development in Non-Profit Senior Living/Senior Care
  • Knowledge of PACE program preferred
  • Demonstrated collaborative leadership style and a proven track record of sustained portfolio growth within a region
  • Experience in launching and supporting senior care facilities in new territories.

PACE Vice President Benefits

  • Competitive salary, with bonus opportunities
  • Comprehensive benefits package
  • Great work environment with opportunity for growth
  • Hybrid work model
